title: Automatically obtaining data from Damodaran's website with R
description: A quick tutorial on how to obtain data automatically from Damodaran's website with R.
contents:
NYU professor Aswath Damodaran has very helpful data about many important financial market topics such as discount rates, valuation multiples, etc. on his website. However, the data is saved in Excel files that do not necessarily have a standardized format to easily obtain the information automatically.
ScreenshotDistill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
